name: Lonely Rooms
description:
Short unfinished horror project with no real ending that I decided to upload whilst I work on a better project. You wake up in a dark room and try to find your way out.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

CTRL - Crouch

SPACE - Jump

E - Interact

1,2,3 -  Change equipped

TAB - Inventory

ESC - Pause Menu
